audio_player_error: there was an error while playing the audio file: code %1$s
auto_black: Use true black for auto-dark theme
confirm_copy_file_import: imported zip files will be copied to the app data folder
confirm_delete_packs: are you sure you want to delete those %1$s packs?
donate: Please consider making a small donation to help fund the project
download_webview_description: follow the instruction to start the download
export_settings_desc: export all application settings so that you can import them later
first_presentation: Conty can play stories you manually add to your phone. You can also download stories from remote. Right now you don't have any remote source configured. Do you want to add one?
folder_color_as_background_desc: when enabled the folder color will be used as background color. Otherwise it will be used for the small folder icon
force_long_press_volume_when_not_playing: change volume using longpress when not playing
ensure you can still change volume with longpress on volume button when choosing stage
handle_volume_button_desc: use short press on volume buttons to change selected stage, or long press volume button to change played story
import_settings_desc: import all settings from a previous backup
inverse_images_desc: can make images render better on eink devices
missing_manage_permission: missing manage all files permissions which is needed to access files outside of app files
missing_storage_perm_settings: storage permission is needed to export settings
move_data_desc: all your app data will be moved and an app restart will be enforced at the end
move_folder_desc: move the selected document to a folder. Leave the field empty to remove from any folder
name: name
need_download_browser: we can't download that file from inside the app. You need top open it in your browser(you might have to ask for the desktop version), download the file and import it in Conty
no_space_left: your device seems to be running out of free storage
notif_shutdown_button_desc: show a button to close the app in the notification. Once the app is started again it will propose to resume
notification_audio_desc: audio player notification shown while playing stories
notifs_buttons_settings_desc: settings related to notification and volume buttons
only_inverse_lunii_type_images_desc: only images of stage selection (like lunii) will be inverted
pack_unsupported: this pack does not seem supported. Please report the issue and mention the pack used
please_restart_app: please restart the app the see the change
podcast_mode_desc: when a pack is detected as a podcast it wont be played as a "story" but as a podcast
remote_source_json_url: url to JSON store of remote packs
remote_sources_desc: configure sources to get stories from
show_love: If you like the project please share some love or even contribute
startup_error: there was an error while starting the app. Please restart the app to try again. If it persists please report it
timeout_error: the request timed out. Please check your internet connection and try again
